entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hay River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hay River/Merlyn Carter Airport 07:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -38.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -42.8°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. POP 30%
